About the Company: Pasupati Acrylon Limited started commercial operation in the year 1990. The plant was set up in technical collaboration with SNIA BPD Italy. The Company is principally engaged in the production of acrylic fiber. Its product is used for carpets, blankets,Toys, towels, bathrobes, bathmats, table linen, furnishings, shirtings and sarees. The Companys products include STAPLE Non Shrinkable Type-R, STAPLE High Shrinkable Type-H.S., TOW Non Shrinkable Type-R and TOPS RTU Non Shrinkable Type N.S.
